alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Putnam; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:51PM CDT until July 01 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Western Cumberland County in Middle Tennessee... White County in Middle Tennessee... Central Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Fentress County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 250 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Livingston to near Algood to Sparta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Crossville, Sparta, Livingston, Algood, Monterey, Pleasant Hill, Doyle, Hamptons Crossroads, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Rickman, Clarkrange and Crawford. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 287 and 316. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
